price: او حق پر باطل مه پوښئ او حق مه پټوئ په داسې حال کې چې تاسې پوهېږئ (چې دا حق دی).
arabic: وَلَا تَلۡبِسُواْ ٱلۡحَقَّ بِٱلۡبَٰطِلِ وَتَكۡتُمُواْ ٱلۡحَقَّ وَأَنتُمۡ تَعۡلَمُونَ

version.title: Pashto Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into Pashto language, translated by the team of the Rowad Translation Center in cooperation with IslamHouse.com.

meta.transliteration: walā talbisū al-ḥaqa bil-bāṭili wataktumū al-ḥaqa wa-antum taʿlamūna
